question: You share your room with another student in the college hostel. You find it very difficult to study there because he/she always has parties and friends visiting.  Write a letter to the hostel warden complaining about your displeasure with the roommate.
text: My name is Kajol Dave. I am one of the students living in hostel room number 102. I am writing this letter to express my annoyance regarding the irresponsible behavior of my roommate, Kinjal.

During these parties, she invites many friends from out of the hostel who is not permitted to enter as per hostel rules and regulations. Firstly, I thought it will be ended in a couple of days but she organized the parties each alternate day. Furthermore, she invites her outside friends who speak a very bad language, and also plays music at a high sound, Hence it affects my studies and sleeping time too.

Therefore, for the purpose of stopping this, I want to request you kindly take appropriate action against her this upcoming weekend or provide me with a single room, so that I can study with concentration.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.

error_list.error_des: The spelling of behavior is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
